entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
